# minicbor-derive

A companion crate to [`minicbor`][1] to allow deriving `minicbor::Encode`
and `minicbor::Decode` traits.

# Documentation

Documentation is available at

- <https://twittner.gitlab.io/minicbor/minicbor_derive/>
- <https://docs.rs/minicbor_derive/>
